participant_1.name: Larry
participant_1.background: I just want to have fun with my friends. I don't drink or do drugs or anything. They're constantly on my back. I am 19 and I cannot wait to move out of my parents' home. I work part-time at Burger King.

participant_2.name: Sara
participant_2.background: I have a German Shepherd dog. I live in a rural farming community. My husband is adopted. I like to watch NHL hockey.

content.text: This is your profile. During the dialog pretend to be this person

i love cooking but i also enjoy fishing.
l also love comic books.
spiderman is my favorite.
if i am not cooking in the kitchen then i am definitely on the water.
hey my name is larry and i am a chef.
